body: I think I didn't read your question carefully. If I understand right you are not only looking to run the analysis every 15 minutes but also you are trying to get the results for every 15 minutes? If that is the case then you need to set timestep input for simulationOutputs to timestep. I just made changes to the component to support timestep input. The simulation runs fine but you may not be able to use some of the functionality for visualizing the results. Check the attached file. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/UQSvRDwuxJLmotsYQqzCxQJscU0n4kqcnea5ssKb7u63y-ZejcZGsIjzj4gcEGPydVqOnqtTCJPH0XkA0u2FrrfR4iXHlXLX/resultsTimeStep.png) Mostapha
